website_summaries.verdict: A flexible option and favorite of those who work at home.
pros: We love the 8-foot cord length that prevents one from being stuck at a desk all day
High performing features help speech therapists with accurate results and effective volume control
cons: May have to adjust the microphone for optimal performance

customer_reviews.title: TERRIBLE PRODUCT / HORRIBLE SERVICE
customer_reviews.text: I received the headset June 6, 2020. The headset began going out by the end of June. It finally went out in July. By July 9, 2020 it stopped working altogether. I contacted Amazon which said it was outside of return date, and sent me on to Logitech and and Asurion. Logitech didn’t respond or answer, and Asurion sent me back to Logitech. I’ve purchased this insurance on many products but haven’t had to use it. I will not purchase anything with the insurance. What is the point when Amazon allows the manufacturers to ignore customers making them feel as though they have been given the run-a-round. Seriously disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Chanel Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Bottom line...
customer_reviews.text: The product was fine... until you got to the USB connector. The connector is of inferior quality. The metal sheathing where it joins with the plastic case of the connector is not connected sturdily inside the connector to protect it.... in fact it resides just outside the plastic connector case consequently not very stable, and if bumped with, even a mild up or down force, will cause it to bend and the metal sheathing to come off and leave the connector un-useable. So, Bottom Line... if you can't connect it... you can't use it. It's too bad, I really liked the comfort and sound.
customer_reviews.author: HerbiesMom

customer_reviews.title: These were refurbished and were great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: We use a lot of this model of headphone from logitech. The sound is very good for business phone calls and our teenagers find them to be satisfactory as well for their gaming. The headsets are comfortable for all day wear - which is important to us and also fairly durable. They last longer in the hands of adults in an office environment than for teenagers, however - which is no surprise. We have bought more than 10 sets of these over time for business and personal reasons and believe that they are great value for the money spent. Especially so if they are refurbished or on sale.
customer_reviews.author: Pyrrhic

customer_reviews.title: Good headphones and mic; mute button is essential
customer_reviews.text: I teach for an online ESL company using a video chat software. I love that these have a mute button. Volume is easy to control and crisp.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Sims

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, Reliable,  Practical
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are great! They are comfortable, the sound quality is fantastic (I don't have to have the volume on the computer very high to hear clearly) and the mute option on the headphones has saved me many times (if I'm teaching online and I need to cough or if my child comes yelling into the room...I just hit the mute button and problem solved). I recommend these headphones if you're looking for comfort, reliability and practicality.
customer_reviews.author: Geanette Corbray

customer_reviews.title: Love this headset!!!
customer_reviews.text: On average I am on multi-person Skype conference calls about 50% of my work time. I was looking for something that would be comfortable, good sound quality (in both directions) and preferably noise canceling. I found it all in these headphones. They work GREAT and I can wear them for hours without being aggravated from the fit. I highly recommend these and will be buying a 2nd pair to just keep at home so when I work remotely I don't have to stuff these in my laptop case and risk damaging them.
customer_reviews.author: Chopper

customer_reviews.title: It works and the audio quality is pretty good. If I am wearing glasses sometimes it ...
customer_reviews.text: It works and the audio quality is pretty good. If I am wearing glasses sometimes it will make my ears sore if I am wearing them for over an hour.
customer_reviews.author: PJS

customer_reviews.title: Nice headset, but stopped working after a few months.
customer_reviews.text: I was so in love with this headset - super comfortable, great sound quality, and worked seamlessly with my desktop. Until today. 5 months later it stopped working. Not sure if my particular product is a dud or not, but I'm highly disappointed to have to buy a new one so soon.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen N.

customer_reviews.title: Love logitech
customer_reviews.text: Husband and I prefer logitech electronics to others because as long as our kids aren't being overly destructive they tend to last a while. These fit great, I put them on my kids heads a time or two and they don't move away because the ear pieces aren't uncomfortable. Nice and soft.
customer_reviews.author: S.Crews

customer_reviews.title: Microphone only works in certain positions
customer_reviews.text: The speakers are great but the microphone is a little weird. It only works if the microphone is at a certain angle... It is quiet annoying. Sometimes I have to position it up to my eyeballs for it to work other times it works fine level with my mouth (like it should be). Also the driver sometimes get screwed up and you have to reinstall it.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Hughson

customer_reviews.title: Classroom tough
customer_reviews.text: I've come back to purchase sets of these headphones several times. They're used in several classroom by many students for over a year now. The USB plug is also nifty - - no one wants to take them home.
customer_reviews.author: Oy Vey

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Piece of junk. Came without a box only in a clear plastic bag. Does not have Logitech sign anywhere so I doubt they are genuine. Plus they did not work at all!
customer_reviews.author: Jelena

customer_reviews.title: Nothing fancy, but...
customer_reviews.text: These headphones and mcrophone are WELL worth the money and way better than a couple I've tried that were way more expensive. (I sent those back.) They are comfortable, which helps because I have to wear them for hours sometimes. The noise cancelling work well and the sound is good, even or maybe especially for music. Easy to install (plug and play) and a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Jane M. Teague- Urbach

customer_reviews.title: Nice headset
customer_reviews.text: No complaints. Great for what its worth and used for. Please dont compair to a Bose or other high end headset.
customer_reviews.author: Pogi

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: The product is perfect! I test it out and the sound was clear and nice, the microphone works perfectly as well, people could hear me perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones for Speech and Language Therapists
customer_reviews.text: These headphones provide clear input for transcribing speech samples. I highly recommend them to other speech and language therapists.
customer_reviews.author: Speech Creature

customer_reviews.title: Love This Headset
customer_reviews.text: This is my 4th purchase of this product. (one was chewed by my dog :) so I had to replace it) It is comfortable, clear, easy to use had great clarity!
customer_reviews.author: Esateys

customer_reviews.title: Seems a tad brittle
customer_reviews.text: The plastic used in the construction of these headphones seems like it could be a little cheap, it feels brittle and like it could break easily. Time will tell how durable they are.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Bowman

customer_reviews.title: Bought these for zoom meetings
customer_reviews.text: I bought these while my husband and I were both working from home at the same time and they are a life saver.
customer_reviews.author: angie

customer_reviews.title: No background noise.
customer_reviews.text: The Logitech New Logitech h390 USB Headset with noise-canceling Microphone eliminates the background noise.
customer_reviews.author: W. West Foster

customer_reviews.title: For the price, my wife loves it.
customer_reviews.text: Some of the quality problems in prior models appear to have been addressed.
customer_reviews.author: Liam J Walsh

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase for the money!
customer_reviews.text: While the noise cancellation isn't great, here are the features I appreciate: 1. inline volume control, 2. in-line mute, 3. microphone on a vertically adjustable arm, 4. Truly comfortable on the ears, 5. In-line clip allows operator to hang cord from edge of clothing, taking strain off the earpiece & operator's head.
customer_reviews.author: Jobu

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS
customer_reviews.text: Does what it needs to do with no issues at all
customer_reviews.author: Lola

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always loved Logitech gadgets. And I am not disappointed on this one. Great product. Durable and great sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Williams

customer_reviews.title: Works fine but is not very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The sound and microphone quality are fine but the part that fits over the ears is small and pretty tight and uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: 😜

customer_reviews.title: Clear and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Used this to take an online training course, audio was great and headset was comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Jaime

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I wished I could hook this up to my telephone. I use this almost everyday. I work at home for a call center
customer_reviews.author: DeepApollo

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones for price
customer_reviews.text: Definitely amazing first the price you pay. Great for work and super comfy!
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Stanley

customer_reviews.title: constant static no matter what platform or device i am using.
customer_reviews.text: loved the fit and feel and the way I sounded on the other end to customers, unfortunately, could not get my end to stop being static filled and eventually it was like a squealing fax machine in my ear and I had to stop using them.
customer_reviews.author: Sara J Orndoff

customer_reviews.title: Ehhh
customer_reviews.text: Not great. Liked the mute button, but overall not a great quality product.
customer_reviews.author: michael kamp

customer_reviews.title: Good headset but kinda flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Will last only if you a very gentle with use and storage. Flimsy material but works good.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Johnson

customer_reviews.title: You'll never want to use another headset!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I loved it so much it's the only brand I recommend. I work from home and it works great with all my computer equipment. High quality sound is the best thing about this headset next to the comfort.
customer_reviews.author: ReddQueen

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made, break easily
customer_reviews.text: We've purchased many of these at our small business to try and keep cost down. Unfortunately, they are cheaply made and have various issues that cause them to be unusable. Save your money and buy a quality headset if you can.
customer_reviews.author: Paragon Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I work online and love my headphones. they are comfy for long use!
customer_reviews.author: Amy T

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable headset
customer_reviews.text: I love my headset. It’s comfortable and easy to adjust. The sound is great.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa D. Smith

customer_reviews.title: broke after 2 months. will no longer turn on when plugged in.
customer_reviews.text: broke after 2 months. will no longer turn on when plugged in.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic headsets for the price. Use them at work and easily dampens surrounding noice.
customer_reviews.author: Bambi Computer

customer_reviews.title: and this particular headset is very clear and easy to work with
customer_reviews.text: I work from home, and this particular headset is very clear and easy to work with.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: I had a question and called customer service and the attention was excellent. The headphones have a great price point and I and very satisfied with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Well worth their price
customer_reviews.text: The headphones have excellent sound from low, medium, and high frequencies. Very satisfied with them.
customer_reviews.author: Darwin E. Ammala

customer_reviews.title: the headset is perfect
customer_reviews.text: it feels comfortable on and people tell me the sound quality is good
customer_reviews.author: TTG

customer_reviews.title: Quit Working after 4 months
customer_reviews.text: Quit working after 4 months. Hardly used. Passed return time.
customer_reviews.author: iambetlight

customer_reviews.title: Great volume, fairly comfortable, can be muted.
customer_reviews.text: Enjoyed using them. Suddenly stopped working. I'm pretty disappointed. They were perfect for my online teaching job.
customer_reviews.author: Shedira Swanston

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Works as stated. Used for my business and I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Rashida Waters

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Using this for my online teaching job. Great quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Roxie Gray

customer_reviews.title: fits a little uncomfortably tight but can be opened by placing a book in between ear pieces
customer_reviews.text: I use this headset for online language sessions. The sound quality is good for what I use it for.
customer_reviews.author: coffee drinker

customer_reviews.title: This is a good product
customer_reviews.text: I like it because it cancel out the noise. I use it for work.
customer_reviews.author: julia cuero

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and efficient
customer_reviews.text: It costs much less than other similar products and does it job pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: Lia

customer_reviews.title: Not Durable
customer_reviews.text: Mic quit working in less than 3 months. I only use occasionally so thought it would last at least a year.
customer_reviews.author: Grandmother

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, both sound and recording
customer_reviews.text: Bought before, good quality, so comfortable, i forget i'm wearing
customer_reviews.author: WitchyMomma3
